hero.headline: THE EDGE OF READINESS
hero.description: Providing the UK's high-readiness, world-leading capability across the spectrum of special operations, counter-terrorism, and strategic reconnaissance.

sas.name: SAS
sas.description: The army's primary special forces unit, specialized in counter-terrorism, hostage rescue, and covert reconnaissance.

sbs.name: SBS
sbs.description: The maritime special operations unit of the UKSF, specializing in maritime counter-terrorism and amphibious reconnaissance.

srr.name: SRR
srr.description: Specialized in intelligence gathering, surveillance, and target acquisition (ISTAR) using tech-centric methods.

sfsg.name: SFSG
sfsg.description: Provides specialist infantry support to Tier 1 UKSF units during complex operational tasks.
